    • applyForJobs

      public void applyForJobs(SystemClass systemClassRef)
      This function takes the data structure where job postings are kept. It displays these and allows the lawyer to apply to one of them.
      Parameters:
      systemClassRef - This is a reference to the system class.

    • addDefenseToTheLawsuit
